tool_description: Take advantage of accurate API translation into 110+ language pairs and instant API machine translation into more than 5,900 language pairs. Use API translation for different purposes, including website and software localization or multilingual customer support.
name: Translate.com API
title: Translate.com API

api_list.name: Get human translation order
api_list.description: The endpoint serves to receive the status and translation text of the human translation order. In the "order_id" parameter, you need to specify the identifier that you received when creating the order with the "Create human translation order" endpoint.

api_list.name: User balance
api_list.description:
Get the information about current user words/symbols/tickets balance:
- all available words
- subscription available words
- subscription available helpdesk requests
- subscription available symbols
- words balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-com-api.p.rapidapi.com/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-com-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Human translation language pairs
api_list.description:
Get the list of languages* which are available for Translate API Machine Translation in the format:
- code
- name
- native name

api_list.name: Machine translation languages
api_list.description:
Get the list of languages* which are available for Translate API Machine Translation in the format:
- code
- name
- native name
